robot.script:
import com.workfusion.studio.rpa.recorder.api.* import com.workfusion.studio.rpa.recorder.api.types.* enableTypeOnScreen()
switchToExistingWindow(new WindowDescriptor("Shell_TrayWnd", "", false, false).toString(), 10000)
mouse().click($(byImage("1521275364104-anchor.apng", Integer.valueOf(8), Integer.valueOf(6))).getCoordinates())
sleep(3700)

mouse().click($(byImage("1521275367988-anchor.apng", Integer.valueOf(-62), Integer.valueOf(0))).getCoordinates()) sleep(500)
sendKeys(StringTransformations.escapeAutoitText("mul.sales.ceo"))
sendKeys(StringTransformations.getKeyPressText(15, 9, 9, 0))
sendKeys(StringTransformations.escapeAutoitText("k@lyani123"))
sendKeys(StringTransformations.getKeyPressText(28, 13, 10, 0))
sleep(4000)
switchToExistingWindow(new WindowDescriptor("", "(?i).*\\QMy Page\\E.*", false, true).toString(), 10000) sleep(1000)

sleep(1000)

sleep(1200)

sleep(7200)

sendKeys(StringTransformations.getHotKeyText(114, 0))
sendKeys(StringTransformations.getHotKeyText(114, 0)) sleep(1000)
sendKeys(StringTransformations.getHotKeyText(99, 0)) sleep(5800)
mouse().click($(byImage("1521275411118-anchor.apng", Integer.valueOf(27), Integer.valueOf(2))).getCoordinates()) sleep(1400)
mouse().click($(byImage("1521275412523-anchor.apng", Integer.valueOf(14), Integer.valueOf(3))).getCoordinates()) sleep(1200)

sleep(14900)

sleep(1100)
switchToExistingWindow(new WindowDescriptor("", "(?i).*\\QMy Page\\E.*", false, true).toString(), 10000) sleep(2900)
mouse().click($(byImage("1521275437999-anchor.apng", Integer.valueOf(3), Integer.valueOf(-2))).getCoordinates())
